de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction

Class BodyExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.extraction.BodyExtraction

  • public class BodyExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to extract text phrases from a text corpus.
    Author:
    Sergej Sintschilin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BodyExtraction()
      Constructs a new body extraction object with no text set.
